channel.title: RSPS Unlimited Presents || RuneUnlimited The Server
channel.description:
Yeah, we changed.
[b][u]New Introduction[/u][/b] Well, we are still using the clean Project Insanity we created as a base. Me and my co-owner Andrew, decided to change the name. The hopes are, to set up a successful RuneScape Private Server, backed by a powerful RuneScape Private Server community. Just got clarification, the community is "RSPS Unlimited" and the server shall be called "RuneUnlimited". For some reason, my computer reset so I have to rely on coding my old backup I made of the server, before many things where added into it.
[b]Current Server Features[/b]
[ul][li]Perfected* combat system (No thanks to Uncalled..?)[/li] [li]Improved thieving, herblore, farming, and cooking.[/li] [li]All 525+ animations, including some Dungeoneering emotions.[/li] [li]Fixed alching[/li][/ul]
[b]Current Bug Fixes[/b]
[ul][li]Fixed the alching animation + gfx timing.[/li] [li]When in a trade, bank, or any other interface, you cannot click on the minimap to run away[/li] [li]To prevent Gold Transferring for new players, there is a small tutorial each player must complete[/li] [li]You cannot attack another player in the wilderness, and other players cannot attack you, if you do not have 3 or more items[/li] [li]Fixed the annoying player saving glitch.[/li] [li]Fixed the md5 code.[/li] [li]Re-packaged the server, Sanity did a shit job of doing so[/li][/ul]
[b]Current Dupe Fixes[/b]
[ul][li]Fixed the Rune Arrow duping glitch, mainly featured in Euroscape.[/li] [li]Fixed the Cheat-Engine shop dupe.[/li][/ul]
If anyone has anymore Dupes that they know of in Project Insanity, feel free to post ;).
[b][u]Web Development Information[/u][/b] Currently powered by some site Andrew find, to be honest it isn't that bad. I own the domain, but I'm not applying it until I have VBulletin bought and all set up. Current site can be found in my signature, feel free to sign up.
[b][u]Current Staff List[/u][/b]
[ul][li]John (Me) - RSPS Unlimited founder, RuneUnlimited coder.[/li] [li]Andrew - RSPS Unlimited Co-founder, RuneUnlimited Co-coder and head administrator[/li] [li]Uncalled - Combat Coder?[/li] [li]I Vain I - Head programmer[/li][/ul]
Additional information to be posted.

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“InsanityPk, post:16, topic:373260”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=469278.msg3433018#msg3433018 date=1292523376]

meaga leech
[/quote]This is a development, not a leech. He’s progressing, so shut the fuck up.

sorry thought it would be funny[/quote]
It’s not very funny to some, like the server programmers, like myself, whom are working very hard on this server.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Unlimited Presents || RuneUnlimited The Server
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=[J]ava link=topic=469278.msg3432305#msg3432305 date=1292455269]
No need to bite my head off.
I don’t view many project threads, nor do I play many servers. So I wouldn’t know if its been done before.
[/quote]Wasn’t meaning to criticize you, but you shouldn’t say at last, (implying he is the first), if you don’t even read enough threads to know if people are doing it.[/quote]

No worry’s, a tad to late to change it now, hopefully someone reads it and doesn’t get the same idea as you did.

Read full topic
item.source: RSPS Unlimited Presents || RuneUnlimited The Server

item.title: RSPS Unlimited Presents || RuneUnlimited The Server
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]All I see is complete idiocy in these posts.

[quote author=Pure Slay link=topic=469278.msg3432082#msg3432082 date=1292444701]

PI = New Delta

& Delta = Shit, and not really, PI will always be more stable then that horrible base they call delta.
[/quote]Delta can easily become just as stable as Project Insanity; some people have even made it more stable.

[quote author=Pure Slay link=topic=469278.msg3431584#msg3431584 date=1292391749]
Alot of people are using PI lately, if you want a real challenge try creating your own framework, even if it sucks horribly, the experience you get from writing your own is priceless. Plus you can always improve as you gain more knowledge of java. Although, you can do the same with the existing framework you are provided with. Best of luck, stay committed, thats one reason why almost every project fails now a days, no one has the ambition to complete something, and just backs out of it when it gets to ‘hard’ or time consuming.
[/quote]Why only you only stating you learn Java, whilst working with Private Server frameworks?[/quote]

“Why only you only stating you learn Java” please learn proper grammar first. Secondly, I assume that the OP is programming his server in Java, meaning the framework will also be done in Java. Since frameworks are not RSPS specific, it allows you to have a larger understanding of how multiple things work in Java.

And finally…Delta is shit, and always has been shit, maybe you should go back to learning “Python”, since your project thread has only moved a whole three inches since you originally posted it.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Unlimited Presents || RuneUnlimited The Server
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Pure Slay:

Alot of people are using PI lately, if you want a real challenge try creating your own framework, even if it sucks horribly, the experience you get from writing your own is priceless. Plus you can always improve as you gain more knowledge of java. Although, you can do the same with the existing framework you are provided with. Best of luck, stay committed, thats one reason why almost every project fails now a days, no one has the ambition to complete something, and just backs out of it when it gets to ‘hard’ or time consuming.

Well said, but PI is also a very good base to learn.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

Yeah, we changed.

New Introduction
Well, we are still using the clean Project Insanity we created as a base. Me and my co-owner Andrew, decided to change the name. The hopes are, to set up a successful RuneScape Private Server, backed by a powerful RuneScape Private Server community. Just got clarification, the community is “RSPS Unlimited” and the server shall be called “RuneUnlimited”. For some reason, my computer reset so I have to rely on coding my old backup I made of the server, before many things where added into it.

Current Server Features

[ul][li]Perfected* combat system (No thanks to Uncalled…?)[/li]
[li]Improved thieving, herblore, farming, and cooking.[/li]
[li]All 525+ animations, including some Dungeoneering emotions.[/li]
[li]Fixed alching[/li][/ul]

Current Bug Fixes

[ul][li]Fixed the alching animation + gfx timing.[/li]
[li]When in a trade, bank, or any other interface, you cannot click on the minimap to run away[/li]
[li]To prevent Gold Transferring for new players, there is a small tutorial each player must complete[/li]
[li]You cannot attack another player in the wilderness, and other players cannot attack you, if you do not have 3 or more items[/li]
[li]Fixed the annoying player saving glitch.[/li]
[li]Fixed the md5 code.[/li]
[li]Re-packaged the server, Sanity did a shit job of doing so[/li][/ul]

Current Dupe Fixes

[ul][li]Fixed the Rune Arrow duping glitch, mainly featured in Euroscape.[/li]
[li]Fixed the Cheat-Engine shop dupe.[/li][/ul]

If anyone has anymore Dupes that they know of in Project Insanity, feel free to post ;).

Currently powered by some site Andrew find, to be honest it isn’t that bad. I own the domain, but I’m not applying it until I have VBulletin bought and all set up. Current site can be found in my signature, feel free to sign up.

Current Staff List
